meanings.definition: (verb) to create a hyperlink in a document or webpage
meanings.sent1: I hyperlinked the article to the main page.
meanings.sent2: She hyperlinked the references for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The teacher hyperlinked the quiz to the wrong lesson by mistake.
meanings.sent4: His words were hyperlinked to his actions, making it easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The map was hyperlinked with detailed information about each location.

meanings.definition: (adjective) containing hyperlinks to other documents or webpages
meanings.sent1: The website was hyperlinked with useful resources.
meanings.sent2: The report was hyperlinked to related articles.
meanings.sent3: The hyperlinked document led to a never-ending loop of information.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a hyperlinked encyclopedia, full of interconnected knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The book was hyperlinked with footnotes for further reading.
